### Advance Contract Award Notice for Antimicrobial Stewardship

**Notice Title:** Advance Contract Award Notice
**Reference Number:** PW-23-01025439

The Department of Indigenous Services Canada (ISC) intends to award a contract for antimicrobial stewardship services to YOKO S. SCHREIBER (DR). These services will be utilized to optimize antimicrobial use in nursing stations for improving patient safety and quality care.

**Work Scope:**

* Present infectious disease topics to frontline practitioners (antimicrobial stewardship, urinary tract infection, skin infection, upper and lower respiratory tract infections)
* Develop guidelines, protocols, or tools for use by frontline practitioners
* Create online learning modules on relevant infectious disease topics for frontline practitioners
* Assist with antimicrobial stewardship quality assurance/quality improvement projects

**Selection Criteria:**

To be considered, suppliers must meet the following minimum essential requirements:

* Experience:
	+ 15 years of experience in the past 20 years as an assistant professional in medicine and infectious disease
	+ 10 years of experience in the past 20 years as an external medical advisor for the Nursing Station Formulary Pharmacy and Therapeutics Committee
	+ 10 years of experience in the past 20 years providing direct patient care, academic teaching, supervision of learners, and research
* Knowledge and Understanding of:
	+ Infectious diseases, Indigenous health, First Nations Clients' cultures, and challenges of delivering health services to First Nations clients living in remote/isolated communities
* Academic Qualifications:
	+ Undergraduate degree from a recognized university in the field of Epidemiology and Medicine (Medical degree)
* Professional Designation, Accreditation, and/or Certification:
	+ Internal Medicine/Infectious Disease Specialist (MD FRCPC)

**Suppliers' Right to Submit a Statement of Capabilities:**

Suppliers who consider themselves fully qualified and available to provide these goods, services, or construction services may submit a statement of capabilities in writing to [ellyhyeonkyeong.ha@canada.ca](mailto:ellyhyeonkyeong.ha@canada.ca) on or before the closing date of this notice.

**Closing Date:**

February 24, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. EST (Eastern Standard Time)

**Contact Information:**

For inquiries and statements of capabilities, please contact:

10 Wellington St., Gatineau, QC K1A 0H4
